text: [1298 AN, 19 years later] [Static Castle, The Territories of Bipole]
I am Proton Xurr of the Knights of Static.
There is a large band of bandits, known as the Guild of Retool, who have threatened the allied territory of Sine with an attack.
The King has request us, as well as the head of the knights, Sir Scien, to assist Sine against the forces.

speaker: right
text: I would decline, but I suppose this is an order from the King.

speaker: right
text: I'll meet you at the front gates in an hour, is that alright?
Yes, we will await you there.

speaker: right
text: Actually, there's this knight who has offered to aid us...
I'm a newly certified knight, and I wish to one day join the Static Elemental Offense Squad.
Of course, I'll need all of the training I can get to do so.
If you would allow it, I would like to partake in this mission along side you.

false.text: Romra: Oh, sorry for bothering you.
